user_query: I'm planning a trip to Tokyo and I need to exchange 100,000 Japanese Yen to US Dollars. Can you provide me with the exchange rate, including the buy and sell fees? Also, let me know the withdrawal fee in percentage. Furthermore, I would like to know the current price of the Euro and its asset information. Additionally, fetch me the LinkedIn profile data of Satya Nadella.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate for Japanese Yen to US Dollars, including buy and sell fees.
Get the withdrawal fee in percentage for converting Japanese Yen to US Dollars.
Fetch the current price of the Euro along with its asset information.
Retrieve the LinkedIn profile data of Satya Nadella.
